message.content: We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The skin biopsy shows scabies, which is caused by the Sarcoptes scabiei mite. The most appropriate treatment is permethrin cream, which is a topical scabicide. Hydrocortisone cream is a mild steroid used to treat skin inflammation, while nystatin cream is an antifungal medication used to treat fungal skin infections. Capsaicin cream is used to relieve pain in conditions such as arthritis and neuropathy.

We refer to Wikipedia articles on medicine for help. The skin biopsy shows mite eggs and feces, which suggests scabies infestation. Permethrin cream is the preferred treatment for scabies. Hydrocortisone cream may provide temporary relief for the itching, but it will not treat the underlying cause. Nystatin cream is used to treat fungal infections, which is not the cause in this case. Capsaicin cream is used for pain relief, not for treating skin conditions such as scabies.

The most appropriate treatment for scabies is permethrin cream. Hydrocortisone cream is a steroid cream used to relieve itching caused by inflammation, but it wouldn't treat the underlying cause of the rash. Nystatin cream is an antifungal cream used to treat fungal infections, which is not the case here. Capsaicin cream is a topical analgesic used for pain relief, which wouldn't help in treating scabies.

Capsaicin cream is used for pain relief in conditions such as arthritis, diabetic neuropathy, and psoriasis, but is not indicated for scabies.
